name: Cross cut
description:
This is the game for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2, themed "Rewind"
Meet the team: Yanis, Irina and Artyom. This is our first game jam, and we are very happy to accomplish at least something working and looking good. Unfortunately, we've managed to create only one very short level. Hope you enjoy it! :)

The game is about Samurai, the main hero of the amateur movie, made of origami figures. He fights against various dangerous creatures which threatens his home.
But, during the cross-cut editing, he suddenly comes to life and finds the power to control the film. Now he can move through the films and rewind them by the power of the will.
With his new powers he sets off to the adventure to find the source of the threat and shut it down once and for all.

Controls:
A, D, Space - move
J, K, L - rewind top, middle and bottom film
E or ; - dash and attack
